participant_1.background:
I do laundry every other week, but I wish I could do it more often.
i have three great danes.
i have two full sleeves of tattoos.
i have a girlfriend named luis , and she goes to my college.
I enjoy my morning tea with gluten free toast and homemade jam.

participant_2.background:
My mother's bedtime stories helped to develop my love of reading.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
I make enough money to be able to enjoy my hobbies, like music.
I fear that my writing will never be good enough.

content.text: Hey, do you like tea? I love my morning tea routine.
I love tea! I wish I could drink it more often.
You should! It's so good for you. I love my gluten free toast and homemade jam.
That sounds delicious! I'm not sure I've ever had gluten free toast.
You should try it! It's really good. I love to cook, but I don't have a lot of time.
I'm the opposite! I love to cook, but I'm not very good at it.
You should teach me how to cook! I love learning new things.
I would love to! I'm always looking for new people to cook with.
Great! We should get together sometime and cook something.
Sounds like a plan! I'm free this weekend.
